definition: in front of/in the presence of
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Ay, I don't talk behind a nigga back, I say it in his face.
sentences.chinese: 诶，我不会在人背后说三道四，我会当着他的面说。

sentences.english: If you dare to use that word in my hearing again, we part brass rags .
sentences.chinese: 如果你敢于当着我的面说那个词，咱俩就一刀两断。

sentences.english: The doctor sliced his arm open right in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 医生当着我们的面在他胳膊上割开一条口。

sentences.english: He felt he lost face when his teacher scolded him in front of the class.
sentences.chinese: 当老师当着全体同学的面批评他时他感到面子大丢。

sentences.english: He tore up a traffic citation for jaywalking in front of the police officer who'd ticketed him.
sentences.chinese: 他当着交通警察的面，把闯越马路的罚单撕掉了。

sentences.english: Instead of stagehands, the actors will move the scenery right in front of the audience.
sentences.chinese: 演员们将替代舞台工作人员，当着观众的面置换布景。

sentences.english: It is considered rude to pick your teeth in front of others.
sentences.chinese: 当着他人的面剔牙是很不礼貌的。

sentences.english: Act as you would like them to act and do not argue in front of them.
sentences.chinese: 表现出你希望他们多活动，不要当着他们的面争吵。

sentences.english: That dragon lady have three gigolo under her husbands nose.
sentences.chinese: 那位女强人当着丈夫的面，公开有三位小白脸。

sentences.english: His father had just been trampled under foot and stamped upon in his presence, but by whom?
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲刚才被别人当着他的面践踏了一阵，被谁？

sentences.english: He tried to steal sugar under his aunt's very nose, and got his knuckles rapped for it.
sentences.chinese: 他当着姨妈的面偷糖吃，结果被她用指关节敲了一顿。

sentences.english: What does it mean to wipe of the dust against you?
sentences.chinese: 当着你们擦去脚上的尘土，这是什么意思？

sentences.english: Now when the noodles that wears the madam of Hou Ye begs a madam to help and backs this wedding.
sentences.chinese: 现下当着侯爷夫人的面，求夫人成全，退了这头婚事。

sentences.english: Please say it clearly in front of your parents.
sentences.chinese: 当着你父母的面，请把事情说清楚。

sentences.english: In China, the opening of a gift in front of the giver is considered improper behavior.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，当着送礼人打开礼物是不妥之举。

sentences.english: Self-cleaning work, he only thing we seek the presence of people do?
sentences.chinese: 自我清理的工作，他为嘛偏要当着人做呢？

definition: to be put on the spot/to find oneself in an awkward situation
see 萬目睽睽|万目睽睽[wan4 mu4 kui2 kui2]
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to be unable to extricate oneself gracefully/to be put on the spot/to be embarrassed
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage
